data.utilizationMethod: Grip the handle close to one weight plate and swing the opposite plate downward to strike the target

data.proxyObjectName: clear glass pepper grinder with a black lid
data.utilizationMethod: Wrap your hand around the main cylindrical body just below the black lid and swing it like a compact lightsaber hilt

data.proxyObjectName: small green potted plant in a ribbed yellow ceramic pot
data.utilizationMethod: Spread fingers around the pot’s ribbed wall, squeeze gently, and lift the pot upward

data.proxyObjectName: black hard-shell suitcase with top handle
data.utilizationMethod: Grab the suitcase’s top handle with one hand and shove or tug the whole case in a straight line on the floor

data.proxyObjectName: blue upholstered bench seat with black metal frame

data.proxyObjectName: green Lay's sour cream & onion potato chips bag, partially opened
data.utilizationMethod: Hold a loose section of the bag between thumb and middle finger and squeeze it repeatedly with the index fingertip to crinkle and release

data.proxyObjectName: Arduino Uno microcontroller board with USB connector
data.utilizationMethod: Pinch the board’s sides so the thumb supports the back; press the index fingertip onto the small tactile reset button for each shutter click

data.proxyObjectName: white minimalist desk lamp with red cord
data.utilizationMethod: Place one hand on the horizontal bar and the other on the vertical post, then rotate the horizontal bar downward or upward about 90° around the post to simulate valve turning

data.proxyObjectName: 6-string cutaway acoustic guitar with light wood top and red sides
data.utilizationMethod: Slide your palm lightly along the smooth, curved side of the guitar’s body from the lower bout toward the neck

data.proxyObjectName: wireless game controller with gray camouflage pattern
data.utilizationMethod: Turn the controller so its buttons face upward, rest your palm over the button cluster, and press downward clicking the underlying buttons
